ozmod

クラス PipeIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • ozmod.PipeIn

  • public class PipeIn
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class allowing to pass data in from disk or an URL.

    • フィールドのサマリー

      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明

      static int LITTLEENDIAN

      • BIGENDIAN

        public static final int BIGENDIAN
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • LITTLEENDIAN

        public static final int LITTLEENDIAN
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • PipeIn

        public PipeIn(java.io.File _file,
              int _endianness)
        Creates a PipeIn from a disk file.
        パラメータ:
        _file - The file from the disk.
        _endianness - BIGENDIAN or LITTLEENDIAN depending the data you want to transfer.

      • PipeIn

        public PipeIn(java.net.URL _url,
              int _endianness)
        Creates a PipeIn from an URL.
        パラメータ:
        _url - The file from the URL.
        _endianness - BIGENDIAN or LITTLEENDIAN depending the data you want to transfer.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • readContent

        public OZMod.ERR readContent()
        Reads the content of the source in an internal buffer.
        戻り値:
        NOERR if no error occured.

      • read

        public void read(byte[] _buf,
                 int _off,
                 int _len)
        Reads a portion of the buffer previously loaded.
        パラメータ:
        _buf - The buffer to store the data to.
        _off - The zero indexed offset from the start of the buffer.
        _len - Number of bytes to read.

      • readByte

        public byte readByte()
        Reads one signed byte.
        戻り値:
        The signed byte.

      • readUByte

        public int readUByte()
        Reads one unsigned byte.
        戻り値:
        The unsigned byte.

      • readShort

        public short readShort()
        Reads one signed word.
        戻り値:
        The signed word.

      • readUShort

        public short readUShort()
        Reads one unsigned word.
        戻り値:
        The unsigned word.

      • readInt

        public int readInt()
        Reads one signed integer (32 bits).
        戻り値:
        The signed integer.

      • readFully

        public void readFully(byte[] _buf)
        Reads the entire internal buffer.
        パラメータ:
        _buf - The buffer for recopy.

      • seek

        public void seek(int _pos)
        Seeks the current position in the internal buffer.
        パラメータ:
        _pos - The seek position in bytes.

      • tell

        public int tell()
        Gets the current position in the internal buffer.
        戻り値:
        The current position in bytes.

      • forward

        public void forward(int _fw)
        Forwards the current position of the internal buffer.
        パラメータ:
        _fw - Number of bytes to forward. The value can be negative.
